DOC.brief_summary: The aim project investigate effect human daily intake whole milk compare skim milk primarily secondarily respectively : - Blood lipid : total- , LDL- , HDL-cholesterol triglycerides - Risk marker diabetes type 2 : plasma glucose insulin
DOC.brief_title: Whole Milk Compared With Skimmed Milk Effect Lipids
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize control 2 x 3 week crossover intervention study wash-out period , lipids blood know adjust 2 week . The effect diet contain 0.5 L whole milk ( 17.5 g milk fat/day ) compare diet contain 0.5 L skim milk ( 1.5 g milk fat/day ) . Blinding possible since appearance test food conceal . The study subject receive two test food random order , decide draw lot . Blood sample draw first day period end period 3 week-periods .
DOC.criteria: All subject must give informed consent writing , receive oral write information study Age : 2070 BMI : 18.5 30 kg/m2 Healthy men woman ( know disease ) Current previous cardiovascular disease , high blood pressure cholesterol Diabetes Mellitus severe chronic disease , include severe allergy Use dietary supplement two month prior intervention Blood donation 1 month prior intervention Known suspect abuse alcohol , drug medication Pregnant planning pregnancy study period Extreme physical activity level ( 10 hour tough physical activity pr . week ) Participation research study Inability , physically mentally , comply procedure require study protocol , evaluate study staff
